changesets.comments: cgame: fixed mine ID displayed with g_misc 0, refs #933

details.name: subject
details.new_value: Mine and dyna crosshair info does't work properly

details.name: description
details.old_value:
!https://files.gitter.im/etlegacy/kOEp/2016-09-07-135542-goldrush.jpg(mineid)!

The crosshair mine ID text is buggy (see screenshot). The ID is also wrong (on screenshot, this is my own mine, not the bot's).
Dynamite crosshair info is also implemented, but it doesn't seem to work.

Relevant commits:
* https://github.com/etlegacy/etlegacy/commit/1675b29155b419d9a7541c298a14b262eb9c8d4c
* https://github.com/etlegacy/etlegacy/commit/b7586da8e21e200d39aa389ad1279bad6106fed1
details.new_value:
!https://files.gitter.im/etlegacy/kOEp/2016-09-07-135542-goldrush.jpg(mineid)!

The crosshair mine ID text is buggy (see screenshot). The ID is also wrong (on screenshot, this is my own mine, not the bot's).
Dynamite crosshair info is also implemented, but it doesn't seem to work.

Interestingly, g_misc is set to 0. Dyna and mine ID should only be enabled when the g_misc bitflag 8 and 16 are set.

Relevant commits:
* https://github.com/etlegacy/etlegacy/commit/1675b29155b419d9a7541c298a14b262eb9c8d4c
* https://github.com/etlegacy/etlegacy/commit/b7586da8e21e200d39aa389ad1279bad6106fed1

subject: Mine crosshair does't work properly
description:
!https://files.gitter.im/etlegacy/kOEp/2016-09-07-135542-goldrush.jpg(mineid)!

The crosshair mine ID text is buggy (see screenshot). The ID is also wrong (on screenshot, this is my own mine, not the bot's).

Interestingly, g_misc is set to 0. Dyna and mine ID should only be enabled when the g_misc bitflag 8 and 16 are set.

Relevant commits:
